The Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (FATCA), requires us to generally acquire information regarding foreign assets held by applicants. • Government of Pakistan Issued CNIC/SNIC \n • Original fullsize, unedited CNIC/SNIC \n • Place CNIC/SNIC against a single coloured background \n • Readable, well-lit, coloured images \n • Scanning a photocopied CNIC/SNIC is not allowed \n • CNIC/SNIC should not be edited or expired \n
Father/Husband Name Full Name (As per NADRA Record)
Mobile Number * Have You Ported Your Mobile Network ? To update your mobile network in bank\'s system, please write "MNP" in message and send it to 9225 and 9080. Otherwise, you will not be able to receive One Time Password on your mobile phone. CNIC * Mobile Network * Mobile Number * Have you ported your mobile network?
